articles.title: Earth Hits Halley's Comet Trail As Neptune Appears: The Night Sky This Week - Forbes
articles.description: Each Monday, I pick out North America’s celestial highlights for the week ahead (which also apply to mid-northern latitudes in the northern hemisphere).
articles.content:
The Eta Aquariids meteor showercaused by Halley's cometpeaks this week in dark, moonless night ... [+] skies.
